<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete model"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/{ModelId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a model from the system.

**Prerequisites**
- **ModelId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/models](/docs/api/models/search-models) to find the model to delete

**Warning**: Deleting a model may affect assets that reference it. Ensure no assets are using this model before deletion.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search models: [POST /api/v1.0/models](/docs/api/models/search-models) â†’ find model to delete
2. Verify no assets use this model
3. Call this endpoint: DELETE /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/models/bulk/delete](/docs/api/models/bulk-delete-models) - Delete multiple models at once

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ModelId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the model to delete. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/models](/docs/api/models/search-models).","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].ModelId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
